K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-031:207b-0: @207b lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-031:207b-1: dus gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-031:207b-2: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug gsum rgyus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-031:207b-3: sdig min las grub lha dang lha ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-031:207b-4: dmyal ba tshogs me ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'di ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-031:207b-5: sha khrag dmar la rol pa'i lha mo khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-031:207b-6: lha yi g-yul ngo rgyal bar zhal 'ches las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-031:207b-7: lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod //
